title: Synoviocyte-chondrocyte triculture model for early-stage PTOA: fibronectin fragment-induced catabolic effects
abstract: Post-traumatic osteoarthritis (PTOA), a subtype of osteoarthritis initiated by joint trauma, is driven by unresolved early inflammation that ultimately leads to cartilage degeneration. Although animal models have advanced our understanding of disease progression, they offer limited resolution of the early molecular events following trauma. In this study, we developed a transwell-based
